entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is described as the home of the Weasley family, where Fred and George are currently located.

entities.name: perkins
entities.description: Perkins is an old warlock who works with Mr. Weasley in the office.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dad refers to Mr. Weasley, who is described as being frantic and having a tendency to take apart Muggle objects and put spells on them.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins, who is laughing about his dad's antics with Muggles.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another Weasley twin, who is peering down through the windscreen and commenting on their location.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story, who is observing the scene from the car.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum refers to Mrs. Weasley, who is driven mad by her husband's antics with Muggle objects.

entities.name: the teapot
entities.description: The teapot is described as going berserk and squirting boiling tea.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley works with Perkins in the office, as described by Fred.
Mr. Weasley had to deal with the consequences of the teapot's malfunction.
Fred is one of Mr. Weasley's children, as described by his own statement.
George is another of Mr. Weasley's children, as described by his own statement.
Harry is acquainted with Fred, as they are both in the car together.
